instructions: Nathanrist February 17, 2012 at 11:50 am you need shsh to downgrade. error 1600 is an incompatible firmware and your device is in DFU mode which explains the recovery message and black screen. if you have shsh for the version your downgrading toyou have to put into pwned DFU mode, option/shift click restore and select your firmware .ipsw file, you may need to use recboot to kick out of recovery also Mike December 23, 2011 at 6:24 pm iOS is not meant to be downgraded. If you rely on jailbreak or whatever simply don't upgrade iOS before a working jailbreak is released and approved by the community. Anonymous December 23, 2011 at 4:56 pm you can try this under your responsibility How to Fix Error 3194, 1602/04, 1013/15 When Downgrading From iOS 5 to 4.X (Windows) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IW4ishj2jEs
